2065930.name: The Corpse Crusade
2065930.description:
Satan is dead.
Saints rule the Earth.
Get in touch with your divinity.

Dark fantasy pixelart hack-and-slash adventure.
Explore a medieval world full of bizarre demons and even more fearsome zealots.
Lead a troop of Santifrancan crusaders, and other peculiar adventurers, in a fight against heretics & demons while unraveling a sinister conspiracy.
Experience a revenge journey full of twists and turns as you explore a violent and quirky world.
Battle over 30+ boss fights against demons, Saints, and everything in between.

War veteran Simon Vicario rejoins the military with nothing left to lose, only to end up having to re-examine his values and beliefs while protecting those he cares about. A story about re-finding meaning in life.



How will a man find meaning in a brutal world? Will you inspire your soldiers through hope or hatred?
Hope and Hate Routes depending on player actions alter the story and feature route-exclusive content.



Fully developed by a solo gamedev.
Game under development. Screenshots on store page are are subject to change.

suomiperkele ikuinen isänmaa finnish freedom forever
2065930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
